name: Pawn Shop
long_description: You almost trip as you step into an abominable clutter of the claustrophobic interior inside the tiny shop. It smells like an abandoned shed full of rusty tools, and avian twittering resonates from several hidden nooks. It is lit with almost-enough light bulbs, all slightly different colors of white hung at irritatingly dissimilar heights. Behind a glass counter fractured in several place, a clerk smiles at you with kind eyes and a good number of teeth.
short_description: A lot of junk for sale in a store the size of a shoebox.

room_features.name: Counter
room_features.description: Nothing really useful to you under the smeared glass.

room_features.name: Shelves
room_features.description: Old computers can always be repurposed...

room_features.name: Store Clerk
room_features.description: A humanish creature, most likely broken and put back together several times in the dark.
